title: PBE Bugs from G00SE! (5.3)
body:
Well, my first post on the forums woo!
So, so far my first bug that I've found on the PBE (Public Beta Environment) is with the minions.
Every few games i get get into, some others have been having the same issue as well, the minions
are completely blue! The others teams minions are also blue so it makes kinda hard to CS. Thats all i've found
so fair either then the regular DJ Sona errors etc... 
thanks for tuning and have fun playing league!
-G00SE

replies.body: They have known about this from the beginning. lol. It's because of the new option. Moobeat posted screenshots of it being bugged and they're already working on a fix.

Hey there! 

First off, thanks for the bug reports! 

Secondly, for future bug reports for issues found on the PBE, please post them on the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback). It helps us keep PBE issues separate from live issues. :]

Thanks again!
